item.title: Construction & Renovation Portfolio
item.description:
Overview

Since 2019, I’ve worked on residential construction and renovation projects through my family business, gaining practical experience in electrical installation, flooring, and full bathroom remodeling.

Experience & Skills

Electrical Installation

  • Residential wiring and circuit installation
  • Electrical panel upgrades
  • Lighting fixture installation
  • Code compliance and safety standards
  • Troubleshooting electrical systems

Flooring Installation

  • Hardwood floor installation and refinishing
  • Subfloor preparation and leveling
  • Precision measuring and cutting
  • Quality finishing techniques

Bathroom Remodeling

  • Complete bathroom renovations
  • Plumbing fixture installation
  • Tile work and waterproofing
  • Finish carpentry and trim work

Key Projects

Full Home Renovation (2023-2024)

  • Complete electrical rewiring of 2,000 sq ft home
  • Installed new 200A electrical panel
  • Coordinated with inspectors for code compliance
  • Managed project timeline and material procurement

Bathroom Renovation Series (2022-2023)

  • Completed 5 full bathroom remodels
  • Custom tile work and shower installations
  • Modern fixture upgrades
  • Waterproofing and ventilation systems

Hardwood Flooring Projects (2021-2022)

  • Installed 3,000+ sq ft of hardwood flooring
  • Refinished existing hardwood in historic homes
  • Pattern designs and custom inlays

Safety & Quality Standards

  • OSHA safety training certified
  • Strict adherence to building codes
  • Quality control at every project phase
  • Professional tool maintenance and safety practices

Skills Transferable to Engineering

Problem-Solving

  • Troubleshooting complex installation challenges
  • Adapting plans based on site conditions
  • Finding creative solutions to unique problems

Project Management

  • Timeline planning and coordination
  • Material estimation and procurement
  • Budget management
  • Communication with clients and inspectors

Attention to Detail

  • Precision measurements and installations
  • Quality assurance processes
  • Code compliance verification

Hands-On Technical Skills

  • Understanding of electrical systems (directly applicable to EE)
  • Spatial reasoning and 3D visualization
  • Tool proficiency and manual dexterity

Why This Matters for Engineering

My construction background provides me with:
